name: A Rite from the Stars
description: Welcome to the Mystical Island of Kaikala, home to the Makoa tribe, and Kirm, a young mute boy who must overcome a rite of passage to leave his childhood behind. Chosen by the Stars to become a legend among his peers, Kirm's rite will neither be ordinary nor easy as he masters the three paths of Wisdom, Courage, and Spirit.
minimum_requirements: Mínimos: SO: Microsoft® Windows® 7 Processador: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent Memória: 4 GB de RAM Placa de vídeo: AMD Radeon HD 5770 1024MB | NVIDIA GTS 450 1024MB | Intel HD4000 DirectX: Versão 9.0c Armazenamento: 7 GB de espaço disponível
